sentences.en: She is attending a three-day conference on AIDS education.
sentences.cn: 她正在出席一个为期三天的有关艾滋病教育的会议。

sentences.en: A new antibiotic requires only a three-day course of treatment.
sentences.cn: 一种新的抗生素只需要三天疗程。

sentences.en: More than 800 delegates are expected to attend the three-day Fortune Global Forum, which opens on Monday.
sentences.cn: 预计将有800多名代表参加为期三天的全球财富论坛，该论坛于周一开幕。
